objects.description: [ChChes](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0144) collects the victim hostname, window resolution, and Microsoft Windows version.(Citation: Palo Alto menuPass Feb 2017)(Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017)
